item.title: Intro
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-pink); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-pink); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-pink); } The Epilogue of the Epoch of Rest S GUIDE Introduction ðŸŒº This article is about Hobart’s utopia, called Vekllei 1. What is this project? Â¶ Utopia has a lot of definitions, but in the end it’s about what it feels like. It has to be personal, otherwise it isn’t all that different from sci-fi.
